entry.source: Warrior of light chosen by the Lord. Let us {F804,5}journey{F801}to the Yamato Reactor.{F804,0} With the power of {F804,5}God's{F801}chariot{F804,0} at your side, you will {F804,5}destroy the hotbed{F801}of Filth that Tokyo has become.{F804,0} The {F804,5}Demon Lord{F804,0}{F801}will attempt to hinder our way, but do not forget{F801}that you have a sworn friend in Jonathan.{F801}
